title: Fragile Beginnings
short_desc: The crew ends up at a space station and picks up a few bounties.

title: Tuck and Run
short_desc: The crew attempts to protect the daughter of the space station's president.

title: Shady Business
short_desc: The crew heads to a super market and explores an ancient temple for an artifact.

title: Dreamin' Scary
short_desc: Some of the crew is stuck in an awful raunchy shared dream.

title: Police Brutality
short_desc: The crew decides to raid a police station and gets more than they bargained for.

title: Killer Ship
short_desc: In need of a larger crew from the new crew members, the crew raids a rival shipyard for a friend.

title: Mousehole
short_desc: The crew, after getting quite drunk, go to DisneyPlanet to steal the elusive Disney Diamond

title: Siren Squoatlings... in Space!
short_desc: The crew relaxes in deep space, chatting with each other and witnessing space sirens.

title: Pirates vs. Pummelers
short_desc: The crew gets ambushed by space pirates appearing to have ill intentions.

title: Toothache Troubles
short_desc: After their pirate ambush, the crew heads to a clinic to get patched up.

title: Ups and Downs
short_desc: Further travels through deep space lead the VP to a utopian planet that treats them rather nicely.

title: Party Planet
short_desc: To celebrate their newest member, the crew heads to a planet of college students to party.

title: Seeing Double
short_desc: The crew lands on a planet only to be ambushed by an enemy team of bounty hunters.

title: Crash and Burn
short_desc: The crew desperately try to find a planet to subdue an enraged squoatling.

title: Worm in the Hole
short_desc: After experiencing wormhole shenanigns, the Polonot crashes onto Seth's home planet.

title: Barrier to 'Entria
short_desc: The crew, having spent the night in the ship, try to find civilization on Seth's homeplanet.

title: Take Two
short_desc: The recovering crew finds strife in body and mind, facing gods of Death and Dread.

title: Cruisin' for a Snoozin'
short_desc: The crew gathers their stuff and takes residence in a new ship that's much larger than the last.

title: Pushing up Daisies
short_desc: The crew, after a short time at the pool, find their very lives threatened by Dread once more.
